Name: XTAL
About the game: A distant past echoes through planet Syro, while its ruined landscapes are being corrupted by a mysterious force. You, as the Seeker, will make use of a lost technology to engage in combat and explore a vast, evocative world. XTAL is a stylish mix of action and exploration with a fast combat system that combines TPS, Hack ‘n’ Slash and Bullet Hell elements with a vibrant art style inspired by French Comics. Tightly tuned controls. Jump, dash and slash your way through deadly foes. Fight your enemies with a blend of melee and powerful magic bullets. Aiming is key! Find and shoot at your enemies' Weak Spots to deal massive damage. Use your movement to dodge hundreds of bullets. Explore an arcane, ruined world and discover the truth behind an ancient technology. Use new abilities to reach previously inaccessible places. Upgrade your arsenal, learn new skills and customize your equipment to create the perfect strategy.
